titles.title: An Open-Source Active Learning Curriculum for Data Science in Engineering

citation.unstructured_citation: R for Data Science, Grolemund, Garrett and Wickham, Hadley, 2018, https://r4ds.had.co.nz/
Small teaching: Everyday lessons from the science of learning, Lang, James M, 2016, John Wiley & Sons
Data Challenge Lab Open Content, Stanford Data Lab, https://dcl-docs.stanford.edu/home/, Accessed: 2020-10-21
broom: Convert Statistical Objects into Tidy Tibbles, Robinson, David and Hayes, Alex and Couch, Simon, 2020, R package version 0.7.0, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=broom
curl: A Modern and Flexible Web Client for R, Ooms, Jeroen, 2019, R package version 4.3, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=curl
gapminder: Data from Gapminder, Bryan, Jennifer, 2017, R package version 0.3.0, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=gapminder
ggrepel: Automatically Position Non-Overlapping Text Labels with gplot2’, Slowikowski, Kamil, 2020, R package version 0.8.2, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ggrepel
googlesheets4: Access Google Sheets using the Sheets API V4, Bryan, Jennifer, 2020, R package version 0.2.0, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=googlesheets4
nycflights13: Flights that Departed NYC in 2013, Wickham, Hadley, 2019, R package version 1.0.1, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=nycflights13

mvtnorm: Multivariate Normal and t Distributions, Genz, Alan and Bretz, Frank and Miwa, Tetsuhisa and Mi, Xuefei and Leisch, Friedrich and Scheipl, Fabian and Hothorn, Torsten, 2020, R package version 1.1-1, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=mvtnorm
viridis: Default Color Maps from ’matplotlib’, Garnier, Simon, 2018, R package version 0.5.1, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=viridis
modelr: Modelling Functions that Work with the Pipe, Wickham, Hadley, 2020, R package version 0.1.8, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=modelr

A Qualitative Study of Engineering Students’ Reasoning About Statistical Variability, Aggarwal, Riya and Flynn, Mira and Daitzman, Sam and Lam, Diane and del Rosario, Zachary Riggins, 2021 Fall ASEE Middle Atlantic Section Meeting, 2021
Computational and Inferential Thinking: The Foundations of Data Science, Adhikari, Ani and DeNero, John and Wagner, David, 2021, https://inferentialthinking.com/chapters/intro.html
Data Science: A First Introduction, Timbers, Tiffany-Anne and Campbell, Trevor and Lee, Melissa, 2021, https://ubc-dsci.github.io/introduction-to-datascience/
Statistical thinking in empirical enquiry, Wild, Chris J and Pfannkuch, Maxine, International statistical review, 67, 3, 223–248, 1999, Wiley Online Library
Exploratory data analysis, Tukey, John W., 2, 1977, Reading, Mass.
New pedagogy and new content: The case of statistics, Moore, David S, International statistical review, 65, 2, 123–137, 1997, Wiley Online Library
